title: 247 - The Top 6 Most Important Things My Creative Heroes Taught Me

itunes:title: 247 - The Top 6 Most Important Things My Creative Heroes Taught Me
itunes:author: andy j pizza, andy j miller, yoni wolf, chris graham, alex sugg
itunes:summary:
Like all my creative heroes I am standing on the shoulders of my creative heroes!

In this episode I go through the 6 talks that changed my creative career, the crucial lesson each one taught me and how it impacted my creative career and a dramatic way.

I cut all the fat from this episode and it is a super shot of creative pep!! DRINK UP!!!
